direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods deal with the MTU parameter, one sets it and the other retrieves it.
Both methods involve updating the MTU parameter with similar control flows.
Both methods are related to managing the MTU, though one sets it directly and the other adjusts it based on network conditions.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the socket and setting the MTU are both part of the setup process for the socket.
Connecting the socket and setting the MTU are both operations that affect the socket's state and network parameters.
After setting the MTU, verifying the MTU value can help in asserting the correctness of the operation.
